Review_Title: A helpful review of Cisco Webex Teams
Review_body: When  I  have  meetings  and  video  calls  with  other  people  in  different  departments  of  the  university  we  use  Webex  because  its  an  easy  way  to  talk  about  projects  and  ask  if  people  have  questions.  We  have  different  faculties  around  the  country  and  we  need  to  be  in  communication  with  them  to  manage  the  projects.
Review_pros: Quality  of  video  calls  Share  screens
Review_cons: Sound

Review_body: Webex  Teams  is  the  tool  that  we  are  using  to  collaborate  between  the  employees  of  the  company  and  the  customers.  One  of  the  biggest  benefits  that  I  see  is  that  you  can  use  it  on  any  device  like  computers,  laptops,  and  mobile  devices,  no  matter  where  you  are.  Webex  Teams  has  an  easy  to  use  video  endpoint  and  now  with  Webex  calling,  you  may  do  calls  with  your  users  on-premise  and  to  PSTN.The  problem  that  I  see  is  when  you  try  to  interact  with  Microsoft  Teams  because  the  calls  between  endpoints  are  not  transparent.
Review_pros: Easy,  intuitive  to  use  You  may  use  it  anywhere
Review_cons: Integration  with  other  trades/products  Calls  to  the  PSTN  using  CUCM  in  the  enterprise

Review_Title: Webex Teams help us to respond to InfoSec incidents
Review_body: We  use  Webex  Team  to  coordinate  actions  with  our  Info  Sec  Team  and  Cisco  Incident  Response  Service.
Review_pros: It  is  highly  reliable  It  is  very  intuitive  Allows  for  an  easy  communication  anytime,  anywhere
Review_cons: If  you  use  Microsoft  Teams,  Cisco  Webex  Teams  overrides  some  registry  keys  at  startup  so  Microsoft  Teams  is  no  longer  your  default  collaboration  app

Review_Title: Webex Teams is an all-in-one communications and collaboration tool
Review_body: Se  utiliza  en  toda  la  organización,  la  parte  de  ingeniería  para  tener  grupos  de  chat  y  tomar  algunos  meetings  desde  ahi,  también  es  utilizado  para  conectarnos  a  dispositivos  como  Web  Ex  board,  room  kit,  sx20,  sx80  y  es  nuestra  herramienta  de  trabajo  It  is  used  throughout  the  organization,  the  engineering  part  to  have  chat  groups  and  take  some  meetings  from  there,  it  is  also  used  to  connect  us  to  devices  like  Web  Ex  board,  room  kit,  sx20,  sx80  and  is  our  main  tool  for  office  use
Review_pros: Es  una  herramienta  de  para  compartir  información,  imágenes  archivos.  //  Good  for  sharing  information  and  image  files  Crear  grupos  de  apoyo  y  de  trabajo  atraves  de  meetings  //  Helps  create  support  and  work  groups  through  meetings  Tener  llamadas  y  videoconferencias  //  You  can  host  calls  and  videoconferences  Elaborar  mapas,  dibujos  en  tiempo  real  sobre  la  aplicación  //  You  can  create  maps  and  drawings  in  real-time  through  the  application
Review_cons: integrarse  con  otras  aplicaciones  de  otras  tecnologias  (  Skype,  Hangouts).  //  Better  integration  with  other  apps  such  as  Skype  and  Google  Hangouts  Una  mejora  es  la  facilidad  para  crear  reuniones  y  entrar  desde  la  aplicación  de  teams.  //  Could  be  easier  to  create  meetings  and  join  teams  Mejora  que  desee  el  teams  se  pudiera  brindas  un  meeting  de  support.  //  Better  design  for  videoconferences  that  are  providing  customer/technical  support

Review_body: Es  una  herramienta  de  colaboración  que  permite  estar  conectado  con  la  organización  y  con  los  clientes  It  is  a  collaboration  tool  that  allows  us  to  connect  with  each  other  internally  within  our  organization  and  with  our  clients
Review_pros: Compartir  //  Screen-sharing  Seguro  //  Security  and  encryption  Colaboración  //  Collaboration
Review_cons: Facilidad  de  uso  //  Ease-of-use  Acercamiento  con  las  personas  //  Bringing  together  multiple  users  Multitarea  //  Multi-tasking

Review_body: We  use  Webex  Teams  to  communicate  between  other  users  from  our  company  and  with  clients.  We  create  spaces  for  the  projects  we  implement,  there  we  share  files  and  whiteboards  so  that  we  can  take  follow  up  steps  for  every  project.  We  also  have  video  conferences  because  we  have  Cisco  Video  endpoints  such  as  SX20s  and  SX10s.
Review_pros: Video  conferences  between  Cisco  Webex  Teams  users  or  even  to  different "vendor s",  video  endpoints  thanks  to  their  SIP  URI.Spaces,  those  groups  let  us  to  share  files  within  a  different  project  Ease  of  use.We  can  reach  users  from  other  companies  or  even  Cisco  staff
Review_cons: Comment  search  is  difficult  to  understand.  In  other  apps  like  Whats  App "it s",  easier  to  find  comments.The  file  search  within  a  conversation  difficult.  With  other  apps  like  Whats  App  it  is  easier  to  find  files.There  is  no  such  thing  as  audio  comments  like  in  Whats  App  or  Telegram.Cant´t  change  the  folder  where  files  from  Webex  teams  are  downloaded.

Review_Title: All You Need in One App to Communicate Securely
Review_body: Currently  the  enterprise  needs  to  communicate  internally  and/or  externally  easily,  from  any  place  and  securely,  to  enforce  its  objectives  better  without  leaving  their  headquarters,  remote  branches  or  their  homes.  The  Cisco  Webex  Teams  have  been  helping  to  fulfill  with  these  necessities  in  our  company.  Even,  we  try  to  resell  this  service  to  our  end  customers.
Review_pros: Integration  between  Cisco  Webex  Teams  with  API  via  a  bot  Unifies  all  the  collaborative  tools  in  one  app  Accessible  and  easy  to  use
Review_cons: Personal  Directory  Whiteboard  without  starting  a  meeting

Review_body: Con  Web  Ex  teams  estamos  todos  conectados  en  cualquier  momento,  en  cualquier  lugar.With  Web  Ex  teams  we  are  all  connected  anytime,  anywhere.
Review_pros: Misma  interfaz  en  todos  los  dispositivos.  //  Same  interface  on  all  devices.
Review_cons: Me  resultó  complicada  la  integración  con  los  expressway.  //  The  integration  with  the  Cisco  Expressway  tools  was  complicated.

Review_body: In  the  past,  we  used  other  solutions  for  face-to-face  training.  We  allocated  specific  equipment  and  physical  space  for  training.  Now  with  Webex,  we  can  virtually  train  our  teams,  cutting  down  on  costs.
Review_pros: Team  collaboration  Immediate  communication
Review_cons: Features  &  accessories  Improved  documentation  and  manuals  Better  compatibility  with  IOS

Review_body: We  use  Cisco  Webex  to  keep  up  to  date  with  the  projects  that  arise  and  create  groups  where  we  exchange  information  on  the  projects  we  are  developing.  It  is  an  efficient  communication  tool  and  sharing  information  vey  fast.  We  also  use  it  for  video  calls  /  conferences.
Review_pros: A  great  messaging  tool  for  sharing  information  quickly  through  messages.Creating  meetings  is  very  easy!  Meeting  can  be  set  up  in  less  than  2  minutes.Webex  makes  it  easy  to  share  large  files  that  cannot  be  shared  through  outlook.Create  groups  for  faster  communication  between  office  members.
Review_cons: The  conversation  search  function  is  not  optimal.  You  cannot  search  for  words  in  a  conversation.

Review_Title: End-to-End Collaboration with Cisco Webex Teams
Review_body: Cisco  Webex  Teams  is  available  to  all  colleagues  within  the  organisation  but  is  used  mostly  by  the  sales  and  marketing  departments,  particularly  by  colleagues  who  manage  ongoing  project-based  work.  Account  managers,  technology  experts,  and  marketing  representatives  create " Teams ",  and  use  chat " Spaces ",  to  share  documents,  details,  updates  and  generally  collaborate  on  their  projects.  Using  Cisco  Webex  Teams  helps  them  to  stay  on  top  of  new  developments  in  a  much  more  efficient  way  compared  to  doing  so  via  emails.
Review_pros: Cisco  Webex  Teams  can  act  as  a  one-stop-shop  collaboration  tool,  as  colleagues  can  instant  chat,  call,  and  video  call  one  another,  as  well  as  keep  all  records  of  these  interactions.The  interface  is  clean,  simple  and  user-friendly;  all  features  are  easily  accessible.  This  makes  it  faster  for  team  members  to  adopt  the  tool,  get  used  to  it  and  continue  utilising  it.
Review_cons: When "it s",  time  to  join  a  Webex  call,  users  are  prompted  via  Outlook  to  open  the  call  through  their  browser,  but  also  get  a  prompt  from  Cisco  Webex  Teams  that  they  can  join  the  meeting  in  the  tool  there.  This  seems  unnecessary  and  can  often  be  confusing  -  users  should  have  the  ability  to  pre-determine  which  option  will  be  their  default  choice.There "aren t",  many  ways  to  customise  the  view  of  Webex  Teams  Spaces,  this  would  be  a  nice  feature  to  have.

Review_body: Cisco  Webex  Teams  is  used  in  testing  mode  between  a  few  users.  If  the  testing  ends  with  a  good  review,  I  hope  Webex  Teams  will  be  used  across  the  whole  organization  for  full  use  like  instant  messaging,  calling  and  collaboration  on  documents.  For  the  next  step  is  using  chatbots  for  internal  use  to  help  our  employees  and  next  chatbots  for  external  use  on  internet  public  sites  to  help  our  clients.
Review_pros: IM,  Calling  and  Collaboration  in  one  product.IM  and  calling  across  organizations  without  limits.Chat  robots.Collaboration  on  a  one  document.Whiteboard  for  all  devices  with  multiple  editing.
Review_cons: Dual  Room  system  combined  with  room  board,  one  display  for  video  and  second  display  for  whiteboard.Logging  for  other  products  like  SIEM.

Review_Title: Plays well with other Cisco collab products
Review_body: At  this  time,  we  are  currently  using  Cisco  Webex  Teams  in  a  limited  scope.  Our  IT  department  is  currently  using  it  internally,  and  to  some  extent,  external.  We  are  using  Cisco  Webex  Teams  in  order  for  our  staff  to  communicate  and  share  files.  Some  users  are  taking  advantage  of  the  built-in  Webex  functionality.
Review_pros: Team  collaboration  External  communications
Review_cons: Not  intuitive  Confusing  at  times  for  non-tech  users

Review_body: We  are  using  the  platform  throughout  the  organization  for  work  meetings  thereby  avoiding  the  transfer  to  different  sites.  At  the  moment  we  are  having  difficulties  with  the  option  of  joining  the  meetings  through  a  telephone  number.  In  general  we  are  very  satisfied  with  the  functionality  of  this  platform.----Estamos  utilizando  la  plataforma  en  toda  la  organización  para  reuniones  de  trabajo  evitando  con  ello  el  traslado  a  los  diferentes  sitios.  Al  momento,  estamos  teniendo  dificultades  con  la  opción  de  unirnos  a  las  reuniones  a  través  de  un  numero  telefónico.  en  general  estamos  muy  satisfecho  con  la  funcionalidad  de  esta  plataforma.
Review_pros: Ease  of  long  distance  communication  and  decision  making  |  Facilidad  para  la  comunicación  a  distancia  y  tomas  de  decisiones  Very  intuitive  and  easy  to  operate  |  Muy  intuitivo  y  de  fácil  operación  Communication  mobility  |  Movilidad  para  la  comunicación  Transfers  are  avoided  and  paperwork  is  expedited  |  Se  evitan  los  traslados  y  se  agilizan  los  trámites
Review_cons: Being  able  to  add  an  endpoint  in  the  favorites  list  only  allows  you  to  add  contacts  |  Agregar  Endpoint  en  la  lista  de  favoritos  solo  permite  agregar  contactos

Review_body: We  use  Webex  Teams  to  enhance  critical  communication  between  members  of  the  same  department  and  between  departments.  It  also  helps  us  to  communicate  with  our  customers  when  they  have  Webex  Teams  and  improve  the  end-customer  experience  and  attention  we  provide.  This  enhanced  communication  helps  us  to  avoid  prolonged  waiting  time  and  waste  of  human  and  technology  resources.
Review_pros: Sharing  documentation  with  members  from  the  same  department/area.Planning  Web  Ex  Support  sessions  with  customers.Create  work  groups  with  members  from  different  internal  areas  and  with  members  and  customers.
Review_cons: It  is  slow  to  load  when  the  machine  starts.Conversation  display  can  be  enhanced.Response  time  is  a  little  slow  if  synchronizing  between  two  devices  with  the  same  account  (Android/PC).

Review_body: We  are  using  Cisco  Webex  Teams  only  in  our  department,  it  helps  us  with  sharing  information  in  an  easy  way  and  to  organize  differents  subjects  and  the  discussion  that  it  may  result  in.  It  is  a  great  tool  to  manage  your  team  and  to  get  in  touch  with  them  giving  feedback  on  their  tasks.
Review_pros: Easy  to  use  Easy  to  organize  Fast  implementation
Review_cons: No  cons

Review_Title: Putting projects in action with Webex Teams
Review_body: Usamos  webex  team  para  incrementar  y  mejorar  la  colaboración  y  comunicación  entre  colaboradores,  estudiantes  y  docentes,  especialmente  proyectos  multicampus.  Nos  ayudó  a  reducir  costos  y  agilizar  el  avance  de  estos  proyectos  We  use  Webex  Teams  to  increase  and  improve  collaboration  and  communication  between  collaborators,  such  as  students  and  teachers,  especially  on  multi-campus  projects.  It  helped  us  reduce  costs  and  speed  up  the  progress  of  these  projects.
Review_pros: Se  integra  con  otras  aplicaciones  muy  bien  //  Integrates  with  other  applications  really  well  La  calidad  de  voz  es  importante  y  con  sus  codex  lo  hace  muy  bien  //  Audio  quality  is  really  important  and  with  its  audio  codec  it  is  very  good  Soporta  múltiples  plaformas  //  Supported  across  multiple  platforms

Review_Title: What a non technical admin thinks of Cisco Webex Teas
Review_body: We  use  Cisco  Webex  Teams  across  the  whole  organization.  It  has  proven  to  be  a  valuable  asset  to  solve  communication  problems  and  needs  such  as  corporate  chat,  ticketing  management  and  other  needs.
Review_pros: Easy  to  use  corporate  chat  Easy  user  enrollment  Easy  deployment
Review_cons: Push  notifications  for  Android  devices  -  I  never  receive  them.Differences  between  spaces  and  teams,  better  induction.Option  to  reset  passwords  and  other  management  options  on  the  console.

Review_Title: Webex: a formal and safe business environment for my team (Un entorno empresarial, formal y seguro para mi equipo de trabajo)
Review_body: This  tool  has  become  our  formal  business  space  for  project  management  and  internal  and  external  formal  communication.  Support  point  for  internal  and  external  clients  and  means  of  sharing  and  documenting  confidential  information  in  a  safe  and  efficient  way,  with  real  and  extensive  history,  which  allows  finding  information  while  online  or  offline.-----Esta  herramienta  se  ha  convertido  en  nuestro  espacio  formal  y  empresarial  para  el  manejo  de  proyectos  y  comunicacion  formal  interna  y  externa.  Punto  de  soporte  para  cliente  interno  y  externo  y  medio  de  compartir  y  documentar  informacion  confidencial  de  manera  segura  y  eiciente,  con  historial  real  y  extenso,  que  permite  encontrar  informacion  estando  online  o  offline
Review_pros: Online  and  offline  conversation  history  |  historial  de  conversacion  online  y  offline  Security  |  seguridad  Large  file  sharing  |  permite  compartir  archivos  de  gran  tamano
Review_cons: Difficult  to  find  information,  documents,  or  images  |  dificil  de  encontrar  informacion  de  documentos  o  imagenes  Notifications  on  mobile  devices  sometimes  does  not  work  despite  being  enabled  |  las  notificaciones  en  dispositivos  moviles  en  ocasiones  no  funciona  a  pesar  de  estar  habilitadas

Review_Title: Before Picking Webex Teams, Consider Alternatives
Review_body: We  implemented  Cisco  Webex  Teams  across  our  whole  organization  over  a  year  ago.  We  implemented  it,  along  with  the  full  Webex  license  for  some  users,  over  a  year  ago  with  the  intent  that  it  would  improve  communication  throughout  our  organization  as  well  as  between  us  and  our  business  partners.  Webex  Teams  provides  an  alternative  to  email  for  enabling  collaboration.
Review_pros: It  has  a  lightweight  and  simple  installation  package  that  makes  it  easy  for  most  users  to  get  up  and  running.The  interface  is  fairly  straightforward  and  most  people  can  start  using  it  right  away.It  provides  a  repository  for  saving  whiteboard  from  Spark  boards.
Review_cons: It  can  be  challenging  to  use  Webex  Teams  for  starting  a  simple  chat  with  a  co-worker.Most  of  our  users,  for  whatever  reason, "don t",  notice  when  a  chat  has  been  initiated  or  a  message  posted  without  actually  opening  the  app  purposefully.It  is  strangely  difficult  to  find  other  users  in  the  same  organization--whether  they  have  completed  their  account  set-up  or  not.

Review_Title: New exciting experience: Cisco Webex Teams
Review_body: I  have  just  started  to  use  Cisco  Webex  Teams  during  the  Cisco  Live  Barcelona  event.  I  find  it  easy  to  use.  It  has  a  good  integration  with  Webex  application,  and  I  can  even  see  my  history  of  calls  made  in  Webex.  It  really  looks  good,  and  I  am  looking  forward  to  see  how  it  will  integrate  with  other  applications  like  Skype  for  Business  or  Microsoft  Teams.

Review_cons: None  at  the  moment
